description:
This course is on how to become the best negotiator you can be. In negotiating you'll either end up on top, the loser, or leave with nothing. This course will help you end up on top by knowing these 7 tips and understanding them;

  • Never make the first offer
  • Never accept the first offer
  • Listen more, talk less
  • Never make quick deals when buying and make fast deals when selling
  • Never tell what your bottom or top line is
  • Lowballing respectfully
  • Walking away

This course is meant for sellers and buyers of all sorts of products and services. Everything I talk about is from real life experiences that I have encountered myself as a seller and buyer. There will be a series of video that have one target per video and it will be simplified because no one likes complicated explanations and real life evidence will be provided to show these tips work like magic. Take this course to refine your skills to receive the best deal you can and to boost your self-esteem in the business world.
title: Become An Expert At Negotiating
